# Change Log

## [0.0.8] - 2018.09.11
### Added
- Added length
- Added custom tag in toString()

### Updated
- Updated dependencies
- Improved build

## [0.0.7] - 2018.07.25
### Updated
- Updated dependencies
- Migrating to jest
- Optimization of the status

## [0.0.6] - 2018.04.11
### Added
- Support `--experimental-modules`
- Using [rollupjs](https://github.com/rollup/rollup) for build

### Updated
- Refactoring

## [0.0.5] - 2018.03.01
### Updated
- Switch CLRF to LF

## [0.0.4] - 2018.02.24
### Updated
- All dependencies
- Now mjs files are used
- Fixed README.md install

## [0.0.1] - 2017.10.29
### Added
- Initial commit
